definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Le 21:17 (= foregoing; quiesc. [[א]] om.) (NH id.; Aram. [[מוּמָא]], muwmo0);—abs. ´[[מ]] Le 21:17 + 16 t.; sf. [[מוּמוֹ]] Pr 9:7; [[מוּמָם]] De 32:5; —blemish, defect (chiefly H):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in man, as excluding from priestly service, Le 21:17, Le 21:18, Le 21:21, Le 21:21, Le 21:23; disfiguring man 2Sa 14:25, woman Ct So 4:7; (in all [[בְּ]] ´[[היה מ]]); as caused by man upon man Le 24:19, Le 24:20.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in beast (ref. to sacrifice) Le 22:20, Le 22:21, Le 22:25, Nu 19:2, De 15:21, De 15:21, De 17:1 (in all [[בְּ]] ´[[היה מ]]).
fig. of moral blemish De 32:5 (but text very dubious, cf. Dr); [[תִּשָּׂא פָנֶי ְמִמּוּם]] Job 11:15; of shame of repulse Pr 9:7 (‖[[קָלוֹן ]]).
